body:
Ready for review.

~~this is a **work-in-progress**. Absolutely not tested and is certainly broken. For now the PR is only meant to accompany the discussion in https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/6005 .~~

title: dealii: add and use CudaPackage with all related variants and conflicts
